member.name: T:MigrationTools.Endpoints.FileSystemWorkItemEndpointOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the File System Work Item Endpoint that stores work item data in local file system directories for offline processing or backup scenarios.

member.name: P:MigrationTools.Endpoints.FileSystemWorkItemEndpointOptions.FileStore
member.summary: Path to the directory where work item data will be stored or read from. This should be a valid local file system path with appropriate read/write permissions.
